name: Kiwi Swizzle
instructions:
Muddle kiwi and syrup in the bottom of highball glass
Add remaining ingredients and crushed ice until glass is about two-thirds full
Stir 20 seconds and top with more crushed ice and garnish
description: Kiwi is underrated and underused! Tiki is the obvious first cocktail style to work kiwi in to, plus tiki and kiwi are surprisingly similar words... Fun! Chartreuse's herbal explosion is tempered by the unrefined cane character of our Demerara Gum Syrup. This is a stellar and novel tropical cocktail.

ingredients.name: Light Rum
ingredients.description: White rum, also known as light or silver rum, is a type of rum that is clear and colorless. It is often unaged or aged for a very short period in stainless steel or other neutral containers, which prevents it from developing the color and flavor that result from prolonged aging in wooden barrels.

ingredients.name: Green Chartreuse
ingredients.description: Green Chartreuse is a herbal liqueur made by the Carthusian monks in France. It is known for its vibrant green color and complex flavor profile derived from a secret blend of 130 herbs and botanicals. Green Chartreuse has a strong and distinct taste, featuring herbal, floral, and spicy notes. It has a high alcohol content, typically 55% ABV (alcohol by volume). Green Chartreuse can be enjoyed on its own as a digestif or used in cocktails for its unique and intense flavor.

ingredients.name: Kiwi
ingredients.description: Kiwi, is a small, brown, fuzzy fruit with vibrant green flesh and tiny black seeds. It has a sweet and slightly tangy flavor, and its texture is both juicy and slightly grainy.

ingredients.name: Pineapple juice
ingredients.description: Pineapple juice is extracted by passing fresh, ripe pineapple through a juice extractor (juicer) or by muddling fresh cut pineapple chunks and then straining out the solids.
